/** com.pharm.chorok.web.admin.repository.ADUserRepository */ SELECT CUST_ID, CUST_USR_NM, CUST_CELL_NO, CUST_BIRTH_DT, CUST_GEN_TP_CD, MRG_YN, PCRT_CHD_CNT, LST_PCRT_YEAR, BRST_FDG_YN, VIST_TP_CD, ZIP_CODE, ADDR1, ADDR2, DEL_YN, REG_DT, REG_USR_NO, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_NO FROM TB_CUSTOMER
CUST_USR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTxt},'%')
CUST_CELL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchTxt},'%')

AND REG_DT >= DATE(#{startDttm})
AND REG_DT <= DATE(#{endDttm})
